roasts.name: Bear Hug // Peru + Costa Rica
roasts.tasting_notes:
Sweet, not dry, chocolate finish. Rewards good technique. Cooler temperature reveals juicy dried cherries.

Makes effortlessly excellent pourover, less easy to make excellent espresso.

roasts.name: Panorama // Ethiopia + Colombia
roasts.tasting_notes: As pourover, caramel sweetness over a chocolatey classic "coffee" backbone. I liked it a lot. Easy to brew a great cup.
